thread.title: Job loss fears after collapse of Britain's Carillion

title: Job loss fears after collapse of Britain's Carillion
text:
Job loss fears after collapse of Britain's Carillion 1:55pm GMT - 01:51 
Britain's Carillion collapses after its banks lose faith in the construction and services company, throwing hundreds of major projects into doubt and forcing the government to step in to guarantee vital public services. Ciara Lee reports   
Britain's Carillion collapses after its banks lose faith in the construction and services company, throwing hundreds of major projects into doubt and forcing the government to step in to guarantee vital public services. Ciara Lee reports  //reut.rs/2B1zmNK
